description: The Polo Soft fit puts a modern spin on classic preppy style with a natural shoulder and a half-canvassed construction. This double-breasted version is crafted from pure linen fabric sourced from one of the world's oldest mills located in Ireland.
fitting_details: Polo Soft: trim fit, with a natural shoulder, a high armhole, 4¼" lapels, and a shorter length.
Size 40R has a 29¾" front body length, a 29½" back body length, an 18½" shoulder, and a 17½" sleeve inseam.
Peak lapels. Buttonhole at the left lapel. Double-breasted silhouette.
Left chest welt pocket. Two front waist flapped pockets. Two interior chest pockets.
Double vent. Lined at the back yoke and the sleeves. Half-canvassed.
Alterations available in Ralph Lauren retail stores.
Shell: linen. Body lining: cupro. Sleeve lining: viscose, acetate. Dry clean. Made in Portugal.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size 40R.
